articles.content: In brief: As millions of people discovered during 2020, working from home isnt all its cracked up to be. The isolation and lack of human connection is real and as Stanford researchers have identified… [+2969 chars]

articles.author: Steve Watts
articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 Patch Delayed Due To Recent Cyberattack - GameSpot
articles.description: The "extensive scope of the update" combined with a recent hacking attack against CDPR has forced it to delay its plans for a major Cyberpunk 2077 patch.
articles.content: CD Projekt Red is delaying the planned 1.2 patch for Cyberpunk 2077. In a series of tweets, the studio explained that the recent cyberattack combined with the "extensive scope of the update" means it… [+1504 chars]

articles.description: That's a big drop for a phone that's barely two months old.
articles.content:
The Samsung Galaxy S21 is already on sale. Surprised? I wasn't.
